description: Contented Garden was started in 1993 by the Bushwick Information Coordinating Action Committee, an umbrella group of block associations in the Bushwick area involved in housing, youth groups, and senior citizens activities.  The garden consists of a small tidy lot with raised beds and ornamental plantings between two houses on busy Bushwick Avenue.  The site is used by the Committee to run various programs and is also used by the neighbors to grow food.
name: Contented Hart Garden
